languages.text: "Да славится в веках {name} фон Валанциус, наследни{mf|к|ца} Теодоры фон Валанциус, полноправн{mf|ый|ая} держат{mf|ель|ельница} Торгового Патента, именуем{mf|ый|ая} Погибелью Ксеносов и Спасител{mf|ем|ьницей} Даргонуса!"

traits.locale_text: "Славьте, славьте {name} фон Валанциус, наследни{mf|ка|цу} Теодоры фон Валанциус, полноправн{mf|ого|ую} держат{mf|еля|ельницу} Торгового Патента, именуем{mf|ого|ую} Погибелю Ксеносов и Спасител{mf|ем|ьницей} Даргонуса!"

languages.text: "Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"
languages.original_text: "Да славится в веках {name} фон Валанциус, наследни{mf|к|ца} Теодоры фон Валанциус, полноправн{mf|ый|ая} держат{mf|ель|ельница} Торгового Патента, именуем{mf|ый|ая} Погибелью Ксеносов и Спасител{mf|ем|ьницей} Даргонуса!"

traits.locale_text: "Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Preserver of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Savior of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the eons!"

"Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Preserver of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Savior of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the eons!"

"Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"

"Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"

"Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"

languages.text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的继承人，贸易授状的合法持有人，异形之灾，达戈努斯的救世主驾临此地！行商浪人万岁！愿{mf|他|她}的名字万古流芳！”
languages.original_text: "Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"

traits.locale_text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的继承人，贸易许可证的合法持有人，异形之灾，达戈努斯的救世主驾临此地！行商浪人万岁！愿{mf|他|她}的名字万古流芳！”

languages.text: «¡Larga vida a {name} von Valancius, hereder{mf|o|a} de Theodora von Valancius, legítim{mf|o|a} portador{mf||a} de la Patente de Comercio, Azote de los Xenos y Salvador{mf||a} de Dargonus! ¡Que su nombre sea glorificado durante eones!».
languages.original_text: "Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Larga vida a {name} von Valancius, hereder{mf|o|a} de Theodora von Valancius, legítim{mf|o|a} portador{mf||a} de la Patente de Comercio, Azote de los Xenos y Salvador{mf||a} de Dargonus! ¡Que su nombre sea glorificado durante eones!».

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウスの{name}よ、永遠に！テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者であり取引令状の正当なる所有者、ゼノの敵、ダルゴヌスの救済者よ、{mf|his|her}の名を永久に称えよ！」
languages.original_text: "Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウスの{name}よ、永遠に！テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者であり取引令状の正当なる所有者、ゼノの敵、ダルゴヌスの救済者よ、{mf|his|her}の名を永久に称えよ！」

languages.text: "Lang lebe {name} von Valancius {mf|Erbe|Erbin} von Theodora von Valancius, {mf|rechtmäßiger Träger|rechtmäßige Trägerin} des Handelsbriefs, Geißel der Xenos und {mf|Retter|Retterin}von Dargonus ... möge {mf|sein|ihr} Name für alle Zeit verherrlicht werden!"
languages.original_text: "Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"

traits.locale_text: "Lang lebe {name} von Valancius {mf|Erbe|Erbin} von Theodora von Valancius, {mf|rechtmäßiger Träger|rechtmäßige Trägerin} des Handelsbriefs, Geißel der Xenos und {mf|Retter|Retterin}von Dargonus ... möge {mf|sein|ihr} Name für alle Zeit verherrlicht werden!"

languages.text: « Longue vie à {name} von Valancius, {mf|héritier|héritière} de Théodora von Valancius, {mf|détenteur|détentrice} légitime de la lettre de marque, fléau des xénos et {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} de Dargonus, que son nom soit sanctifié à travers les âges ! »
languages.original_text: "Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"

traits.locale_text: « Longue vie à {name} von Valancius, {mf|héritier|héritière} de Théodora von Valancius, {mf|détenteur|détentrice} légitime de la lettre de marque, fléau des xénos et {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} de Dargonus, que son nom soit sanctifié à travers les âges ! »

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius'un vârisi, Ticari Ruhsatname'nin meşru Hamili, Zenokatili ve Dargonus'un Koruyucusu {name} von Valancius çok yaşa! Adı çağlar boyunca unutulmasın!"
languages.original_text: "Long live {name} von Valancius, heir of Theodora von Valancius, rightful Bearer of the Warrant of Trade, hailed as Xenosbane and Saviour of Dargonus, let {mf|his|her} name be glorified through the aeons!"
